title: Crafts & Meister
text: is a Japanese <a href="video%20game%20developer">video game developer</a> formed in 2004 when former <a href="Capcom">Capcom</a> employees <a href="Noritaka%20Funamizu">Noritaka Funamizu</a> (ex-general manager of Capcom's Production Studio 1) and <a href="Katsuhiro%20Sudo">Katsuhiro Sudo</a> (producer) left the company. At its start, it had eight employees.
